sn22.34:4.3: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.34:4.5: Rūpaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha.
sn22.34:4.6: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.34:4.11: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn22.34:4.12: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ taṃ pajahatha.
sn22.34:4.13: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
